task.title: Canceling replication
task.shortdesc: To cancel the replication, delete the active replication.

context.p: Canceled replications that were terminated while the replication was still active are displayed within the Past Replications section of Replications.

step.cmd: From the XDCR section, click Delete next to the active replication that is to be canceled.
Confirm the deletion of the configured replication. Once the replication has been stopped, replication ceases on the originating cluster on a document boundary.
